name: In The Shadows (itch) (Gm3)
description:
In the middle of the night the "invisible enemy" attacks!

And it is HUNGRY!!!

Control the creature and catch your victim without them noticing you.

Directional Arrows -> Move

Down Key - > Enter Stealth Animation

You cannot enter stealth mode if MOST of your body is in light.

You build up tension if you move towards to your victim and unbuild by going backwards. Tension will also go down if you stand still without entering stealth mode.

Higher the Tension = faster your target notices you

Happy Hunting!
